direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods reset their respective objects to an initial state, clearing any previously set data.
Both methods clear internal state, though Form.clear() does not exist in the provided code, it can be inferred as a potential method to reset a Form object.
Setting the form name to null in the clear method can be tested similarly to setting it explicitly to a different value.
Setting the field name to null in the clear method can be tested similarly to setting it explicitly to a different value.
Setting the page to 0 in the clear method can be tested similarly to setting it explicitly to a different value.
